articles.author: By SYLVIE CORBET Associated Press
articles.title: Renovation chief: Notre Dame Cathedral is not saved yet
articles.description: PARIS (AP) — The French general who is overseeing the reconstruction of the fire-devastated Notre Dame Cathedral says the Paris landmark is not saved yet.
articles.content:
PARIS (AP) The French general who is overseeing the reconstruction of the fire-devastated Notre Dame Cathedral says the Paris landmark is not saved yet.

articles.author: By NINIEK KARMINI Associated Press
articles.title: Indonesia's flooded capital disinfected to fend off disease
articles.description: JAKARTA, Indonesia (AP) — Soldiers and health workers sprayed Indonesia's capital with disinfectant on Sunday to fend off possible diseases spread by massive flooding that has killed 60 people and affected hundreds of thousands.

articles.title: Man killed in shark attack off Western Australia state
articles.description: PERTH (AP) — A man was killed by a shark Sunday while diving near Esperance off the coast of Western Australia state.
articles.content:
PERTH (AP) A man was killed by a shark Sunday while diving near Esperance off the coast of Western Australia state.
The attack happened as the man was diving from a boat at Cull Island off Esperance just after 1 p.m. His body has not been found.

articles.title: Car plows into German tourists in northern Italy, 6 dead
articles.description: ROME (AP) — A car plowed into a group of young German tourists in northern Italy early Sunday, killing 6 people and injuring 11, Italian fire officials said.

ROME (AP) A car plowed into a group of young German tourists in northern Italy early Sunday, killing 6 people and injuring 11, Italian fire officials said.
